title: Google I/O 2015 - Polymer and modern web APIs: In production at Google scale
description:
The latest version of Polymer is fast and lean. 

Learn how teams at Google have successfully launched sites using Polymer and the latest platform APIs: Web Animations, Service Workers for offline and push notifications, and material design. And if you're new to Polymer we'll show you how to get started building mobile-first apps.

Speaker(s):
Addy Osmani; Eric Bidelman; Matthew McNulty; Taylor Savage
